verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> hath <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G3860>given<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> an <S%G4376>offering<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G2175>sweetsmelling<s%> <S%G3744>savour<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> ye <S%G2075>know<s%> <S%G1097><s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4205>whoremonger<s%>, <S%G2228>nor<s%> unclean <S%G169>person<s%>, <S%G2228>nor<s%> covetous <S%G4123>man<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> an <S%G1496>idolater<s%>, <S%G2192>hath<s%> any <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G538>Let<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G538>deceive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G2756>vain<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience<s%>. disobedience: or, unbelief

<S%G1063>For<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G149>shame<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> of those <S%G2931>things<s%> which are <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> in <S%G2931>secret<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> that are <S%G1651>reproved<s%> are made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3956>whatsoever<s%> doth make <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>. reproved: or, discovered

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, Awake <S%G1453>thou<s%> that <S%G2518>sleepest<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G450>arise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G2017>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2017>light<s%>. he: or, it

Giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4990>saviour<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%>.

<S%G235>Therefore<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> is <S%G5293>subject<s%> unto <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532><s%> let the <S%G1135>wives<s%> be to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> every <S%G3956>thing<s%>.
<S%G2443>That<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> and cleanse <S%G2511>it<s%> with the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%>,

<S%G2443>That<s%> he might <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G1741>glorious<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4696>spot<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4512>wrinkle<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> such <S%G5108>thing<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it should <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G299>blemish<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> ever <S%G4218>yet<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1625>nourisheth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2282>cherisheth<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>:

<S%G473>For<s%> this <S%G5127>cause<s%> <S%G2641>shall<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall be <S%G4347>joined<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1417>two<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>one<s%> <S%G3391><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>.

<S%G4133>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G25>let<s%> every <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1538><s%> of <S%G5210>you<s%> in <S%G2596>particular<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> even <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> see <S%G2443>that<s%> she <S%G5399>reverence<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%>.
